channel.title: CVE Feed for VirusTran -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VirusTran -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43347|2024-08-19T14:43:17.519Z -- virustran -- button%20contact%20vr
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VirusTran Button contact VR allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Button contact VR: from n/a through 4.7.3.
